meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Maura DeGrande Scott Claremon Steven Durham Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6721.

td.p: Maura DeGrande, a client relations director from Shelby Township, Michigan
Scott Claremon, a tax attorney from Sacramento, California
Steven Durham, a writer and stay-at-home dad from Asheville, North Carolina (whose 2-day cash winnings total $41,100)

tr.td: A CHRISTMAS STORY
1 MAN, 1 CAREER, 1 TEAM
ALPHANUMERIC STUFF
CALIFORNIA
STOCK SYMBOLS
CONTRONYMS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"It\'s Christmas Day!", said this character, "I haven\'t missed it. The spirits have done it all in one night"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: "It's Christmas Day!", said this character, "I haven't missed it. The spirits have done it all in one night"
